item.title: ExpressJS uploads to Digital Ocean Spaces through S3 AWS-S3
item.description: This is a short story. I was trying to use multer-s3 to perform uploads to Digital-Ocean-Spaces (DOS) using the AWS S3 protocol. It ended up failing and implementing a plugin to perform multipart uploads as an expressjs middleware. https://github.com/Daniel-M/multer-dos
